item.text: Pursue love and be eager for the spiritual gifts, especially that you may prophesy.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the one <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> in a <st data-num="1100" class="">tongue</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> to <st data-num="444" class="">people</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="191" class="">understands;</st> he is <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="3466" class="">mysteries</st> by the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the one who <st data-num="4395" class="">prophesies</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speaks</st> to <st data-num="444" class="">people</st> for their <st data-num="3619" class="">strengthening</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3874" class="">encouragement</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3889" class="">consolation</st>.

The one who <st data-num="2980" class="">speaks</st> in a <st data-num="1100" class="">tongue</st> <st data-num="3618" class="">builds</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="3618" class="">up</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the one who <st data-num="4395" class="">prophesies</st> <st data-num="3618">builds up</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st>.

I wish you all spoke in tongues, but even more that you would prophesy. The one who prophesies is greater than the one who speaks in tongues, unless he interprets so that the church may be strengthened.
Now, brothers and sisters, if I come to you speaking in tongues, how will I help you unless I speak to you with a revelation or with knowledge or prophecy or teaching?

It is <st data-num="3676" class="">similar</st> for <st data-num="895" class="">lifeless</st> things that <st data-num="1325" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="5456" class="">sound</st>, like a <st data-num="836">flute</st> <st data-num="1535">or</st> <st data-num="2788">harp</st>. <st data-num="1437" class="">Unless</st> they <st data-num="1325" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="1293" class="">distinction</st> in the <st data-num="5353" class="">notes</st>, <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> can what is <st data-num="832">played on the flute</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2789" class="">harp</st> be <st data-num="1097" class="">understood</st>?

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st>, <st data-num="1063">for example</st>, the <st data-num="4536" class="">trumpet</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">makes</st> an <st data-num="82" class="">unclear</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">sound</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> will <st data-num="3903" class="">get ready</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4171" class="">battle</st>?

<st data-num="3779" class="">It</st> is <st data-num="3779">the same</st> for <st data-num="4771">you</st>. <st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> you do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1325 3056">speak</st> <st data-num="2154" class="">clearly</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">with</st> your <st data-num="1100" class="">tongue</st>, <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> will anyone <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> what is being <st data-num="2980" class="">said</st>? <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> you will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="109" class="">air</st>.

There <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5177">probably</st> <st data-num="5118" class="">many</st> <st data-num="1085" class="">kinds</st> of <st data-num="5456" class="">languages</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">none</st> is <st data-num="880">without meaning</st>.

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st> I do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> the <st data-num="1411" class="">meaning</st> of a <st data-num="5456" class="">language</st>, I will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="915" class="">foreigner</st> to the <st data-num="2980" class="">speaker</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2980" class="">speaker</st> a <st data-num="915" class="">foreigner</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.
It is the same with you. Since you are eager for manifestations of the Spirit, seek to abound in order to strengthen the church.
So then, one who speaks in a tongue should pray that he may interpret.

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st><n id="1" /> I <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st> in a <st data-num="1100" class="">tongue</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="4336" class="">prays</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3563" class="">mind</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="175" class="">unproductive</st>.

<st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> should I do?<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st> with my <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> I will <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st> with my <st data-num="3563" class="">mind</st>. I will <st data-num="5567" class="">sing praises</st> with my <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> I will <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="5567">sing praises</st> with my <st data-num="3563" class="">mind</st>.

<st data-num="1893" class="">Otherwise</st>, <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> you are <st data-num="2127">praising God</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> your <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st>, <st data-num="4459">how</st> can someone <st data-num="2399">without the gift</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> “<st data-num="281">Amen</st>” <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4674" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2169" class="">thanksgiving</st>, <st data-num="1894" class="">since</st> he does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> you are <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>?

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="3303" class="">certainly</st> <st data-num="2168">giving thanks</st> <st data-num="2573" class="">well</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="2087">other person</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3618" class="">strengthened</st>.

I <st data-num="2168" class="">thank</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> that I <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> in <st data-num="1100" class="">tongues</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> than <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,
but in the church I want to speak five words with my mind to instruct others, rather than ten thousand words in a tongue.
Brothers and sisters, do not be children in your thinking. Instead, be infants in evil, but in your thinking be mature.
It is written in the law: “By people with strange tongues and by the lips of strangers I will speak to this people, yet not even in this way will they listen to me,” says the Lord.

<st data-num="5620">So then</st>, <st data-num="1100" class="">tongues</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> a <st data-num="4592" class="">sign</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> for <st data-num="4100" class="">believers</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> for <st data-num="571" class="">unbelievers</st>. <st data-num="4394" class="">Prophecy</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">however</st>, is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> for <st data-num="571" class="">unbelievers</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> for <st data-num="4100" class="">believers</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> <st data-num="4905" class="">comes together</st> <st data-num="2532">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> in <st data-num="1100" class="">tongues</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="571" class="">unbelievers</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2399" class="">uninformed</st> people <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st>, will they <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3004">say</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you have <st data-num="3105" class="">lost</st> your <st data-num="3105" class="">minds</st>?

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4395" class="">prophesy</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> an <st data-num="571" class="">unbeliever</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2399">uninformed person</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">enters</st>, he will be <st data-num="1651" class="">convicted</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>, he will be <st data-num="350">called to account</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>.
The secrets of his heart are disclosed, and in this way he will fall down with his face to the ground and worship God, declaring, “God is really among you.”

What should you do then, brothers and sisters? When you come together, each one has a song, has a lesson, has a revelation, has a tongue, has an interpretation. Let all these things be done for the strengthening of the church.

<st data-num="1535" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100">someone</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speaks</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="1100" class="">tongue</st>, it should be <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> at the <st data-num="4183">most</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st>, <st data-num="303 3313">one after the other</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">someone</st> must <st data-num="1329" class="">interpret</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="1328" class="">interpreter</st>, he should be <st data-num="4601" class="">silent</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st>. Let him <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> to <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1417" class="">Two</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> should <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="243" class="">others</st> should <st data-num="1252" class="">evaluate</st> what is said.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="243" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="2521">sitting down</st> <st data-num="601">receives a revelation</st>, the person who is <st data-num="4413" class="">speaking</st> should <st data-num="4601" class="">conclude</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> you <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4395" class="">prophesy</st> <st data-num="2596 1520">one after another</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">so</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="3129" class="">learn</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> be <st data-num="3870" class="">encouraged</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Indeed</st>, the <st data-num="4151" class="">spirits</st> of the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> are <st data-num="5293" class="">subject</st> to the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>,

for God is not characterized by disorder but by peace.

As in all the churches of the saints,

the <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st><n id="1" /> should be <st data-num="4601" class="">silent</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">churches</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> are <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2010" class="">permitted</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">Rather</st>, let them be in <st data-num="5293" class="">submission</st>, <st data-num="2531" class="">as</st> <st data-num="2532">in fact</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">says</st>.

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> they <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="3129">find out</st> about <st data-num="5100" class="">something</st>, they should <st data-num="1905" class="">ask</st> <st data-num="2398" class="">their</st> <st data-num="435" class="">husbands</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">home</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="150" class="">disgraceful</st> for a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st>.<n id="1" />
Did the word of God begin with you, or did it come to you alone?
If anyone considers himself a prophet or spiritual person, he should acknowledge that what I write to you is the Lord’s command.
<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> does not <st data-num="50" class="">recognize</st> this, he is not <st data-num="50" class="">recognized</st>.

<st data-num="5620">So then</st>, <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="1" /> be <st data-num="2206" class="">eager</st> to <st data-num="4395" class="">prophesy</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2967" class="">forbid</st> anyone from <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> in <st data-num="1100" class="">tongues</st>.<n id="2" />
And do everything in a decent and orderly manner.
